main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Chicago Ridge, Illinois, on April 10, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being blue with red lights on each side and down,No further information was received from the observer following the initial sighting request,The observation was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program to investigate UFOs,The object exhibited rapid and erratic maneuvers during the sighting,The distance from the observer was estimated at 2000 feet.
sighted object: large glowing object with blue and red lights
witness description: George Purtee, resident at 7315 South 79th Ave, Chicago Ridge
